name: ChatGpt
description: ChatGPT is trained AI model, which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer follow-up questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests.

name: DALL E
description: Image generator by OpenAI. Generate images from your own text or images.

name: Get Super Team
description: Superteam makes great action-based AI chat technology. Not the usual, get-me-a-real-person chatbot. Think of it as ChatGPT trained explicitly with all the information about your business. Superteam works for any business that wants scalable 24/7 instant customer communication at a fraction of the cost.

name: Microsoft Designer
description: Initially an alternative to Canva. This tool generate images from your text or images. With editable layouts.

name: Copy.ai
description: Whatever you want to ask, our chat has the answers

name: Airtable AI
description: Transform your workflows with generative AI

name: Google Bard
description: A text generation tool by Google.

name: Stability AI
description: AI by the people for the people. We are building the foundation to activate humanity's potential. They have just released new SDK for text-to-animation.

name: Cohesive AI
description: Experience productivity boost with Cohesive, where the power of human creativity meets the brilliance of AI. Seamlessly create, refine, edit, and publish your work with ease.
